about_the_game: After playing You Suck at Parking cool your heels and keep those fun vibes going with the YSAP OST. Upbeat, motivational and relaxing, there’s nothing better to help you cruise through your day or get you pumped up next time you play.
detailed_description: After playing You Suck at Parking cool your heels and keep those fun vibes going with the YSAP OST. Upbeat, motivational and relaxing, there’s nothing better to help you cruise through your day or get you pumped up next time you play.

short_description: Pick up the You Suck at Parking OST and cool your heels while listening to the upbeat, motivational and relaxing music from the game.
